name: Kune Kune!
description:
Try to not get caught by the farmer while finding and planting seeds. The game might have a couple of bugs, lost track of time and decided to submit it at the last minute. To really start the game sprint towards the rocks blocking the outside of the pen!

WASD/Arrow - Move the Pig around.

Space - Eat the piece of dirt in front of you.

Shift - When your energy bar is full you can sprint for a curtain amount of time.

Ctrl - Plant a seed in a fresh pile of dirt.

Esc - Exit the game

Del - Erase high score

TIP: The farmer will never enter the starting pen (:
